text.indiaInfo: India, officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia. It is the seventh-largest country by area, the second-most populous country, and the most populous democracy in the world.
text.worldInfo: The World is Planet Earth and all life on it, including human civilization. In a philosophical context, the world is the whole of the physical Universe, or an ontological world.
